Headline: #96 Lunt Temporary Westbound Reroute near Lunt/Glenwood
ShortDescription: Westbound 96 Lunt buses are temporarily rerouted via Lunt, Morse, Sheridan, Pratt, Ashland and Lunt: due to, street blockage near Lunt/Glenwood.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #96 Lunt buses are temporarily rerouted via Lunt, Morse, Sheridan, Pratt, Ashland and Lunt: due to, street blockage near Lunt/Glenwood.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #36 Broadway Temporary Reroute near State/Oak
ShortDescription: #36 Broadway buses rrtd NB via State, Chicago, Dearborn Division & State; SB via State, Oak, Clark, Chicago & State due to police activity near State/Oak.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How doe s this affect my trip?

#36 Broadway buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions due to police activity near State/Oak.

  • Northbound buses will operate via via State, Chicago, Dearborn, Division, Clark, then resume their normal route.
  • Southbound buses will operate via State, Oak, Clark, Chicago, State, then resume their normal route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Service Temporarily Disrupted West of Downtown
ShortDescription: Blue Line service is temporarily disrupted between Kedzie-Homan and Clinton—and Western, IMD, Racine & UIC are closed—at the request of public safety officials.

FullDescription.#cdata-section: Blue Line service is temporarily disrupted between Kedzie-Homan and Clinton—and Western, Illinois Medical District, Racine & UIC-Halsted are closed—at the request of public safety officials.
